remarks.format:
## Remarks ServiceCreatorCallback provides a mechanism to publish services that you can request to have created when needed, rather than the service being created immediately when the designer loads. You can use a callback function if the service is not essential and may not be used. A service published by using a ServiceCreatorCallback does not use as many additional resources if it is not requested and created. To use a callback function to publish your service, pass a ServiceCreatorCallback to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.AddService%2A> method of an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>.
